resources.string: I have studied law at Harvard
I\'ve studied criminology at Arkanas State University
I finished high school and went to two years long road trip with friends
What do you want to do

You will soon begin to work in the homicide department at one of the New York\'s police stations. Your mentor and teacher is notorious Detective Jones. His knowledge and experience will surely help you to take the first steps in this demanding profession, but do not let him down! He is definitely the person you should have on your side.

Your first case will be to solve the mystery of the death of a New York University student. Katy was very popular girl, she had good grades, and never got into trouble. And yet, yesterday she was found dead in a fountain in a university park... \nDo not disappoint Detective Jones and show what you are worth - solve this case as soon as possible!
